name: Sofa
description: a long upholstered seat usually with arms and a back and often convertible into a bed.

name: Park bench
description: a long seat made of wood or metal that two or more people can sit on, placed in a public place or open space in a town.

name: Upholstered bench
description: Upholstered benches are exactly what they sound like: benches made with a wooden or metal support and that have seating areas covered

name: Wing chair
description: a tall-backed, heavily upholstered easy chair with armrests and wings, or lugs, projecting between the back and arms to protect against drafts.

name: Bed
description: The perfect bedroom includes a well-constructed mattress that provides you with the sleep surface that best meets your physical needs and preferences.

name: Table
description: A table is an arrangement of information or data, typically in rows and columns, or possibly in a more complex structure.
